source: Attack enemy units or buildings.\nUnits will chase targets.
translation_en_US: Attack enemy units or buildings.\nUnits will chase targets.

source: Guard a position.\nUnits will defend from all sides.
translation_en_US: Guard a position.\nUnits will defend from all sides.

source: Patrol between waypoints.\nClick start and end points.
translation_en_US: Patrol between waypoints.\nClick start and end points.

source:
Are you sure you want to delete the save:
"%1"?

This action cannot be undone.
translation_en_US:
Are you sure you want to delete the save:
"%1"?

This action cannot be undone.

source: Pick a map, adjust your forces and jump into battle. Modern controls and responsive UI.
translation_en_US: Pick a map, adjust your forces and jump into battle. Modern controls and responsive UI.

source: Hover menu items or use Up/Down and Enter to navigate. Play opens map selection.
translation_en_US: Hover menu items or use Up/Down and Enter to navigate. Play opens map selection.

source: Set where newly recruited units will gather.\nRight-click to cancel.
translation_en_US: Set where newly recruited units will gather.\nRight-click to cancel.

source: Select a barracks to recruit units
translation_en_US: Select a barracks to recruit units

source: Are you sure you want to overwrite the save:\n"%1"?
translation_en_US: Are you sure you want to overwrite the save:\n"%1"?
